basicInfo.name: Black Rose
basicInfo.flavor: Black Rose quickly rose through the ranks and became a high-ranking officer. The way she mercilessly carries out her missions is quite a sight to behold.

Normal Attack.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 100% of Physical Attack 1 time(s).
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Damage: To 120% of Physical Attack.

Skill 1.name: Ambuscade
Skill 1.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 340% of Physical Attack 1 time(s).
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Damage: To 410% of Physical Attack.

Skill 2.name: Falling Roses
Skill 2.desc:
All Enemies
 - 100% chance to inflict 1 Buff Removal(s).
 - Deals damage equal to 125% of Physical Attack 1 time(s).
 - Can be used only if the target has a removable buff.
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Damage: To 150% of Physical Attack.
超越6段階達成効果
 - All Allies
 - Adds Effect: 20% All Attack Boost. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]

Passive.name: Assassin's Adaptability
Passive.desc:
Self
 - Heals HP equal to 90% of the caster's Physical Attack upon using a skill 1 time(s).
 - All Allies
 - Grants Petrify Immunity. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
 - Grants Petrify Immunity upon using a basic attack 1 time(s). [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
スキル強化効果
 - Self
 - Adds Healing: Heals HP equal to 90% of Physical Attack upon activating a skill 1 time(s).
超越2段階達成効果
 - Self
 - Adds Effect: 31% Physical Attack Boost. [Always Active]

transcendence.transcend_7: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_8: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_9: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_10: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_11: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_12: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.

profile.likes: White wine, fish, reading, walks, yoga, jogging
profile.story: Black Rose quickly rose through the ranks and became a high-ranking officer. The way she mercilessly carries out her missions is quite a sight to behold.

basicInfo.name: Black Rose
basicInfo.flavor: Although Black Rose is adjusting to life in this world, she's still looking for a way home. In the meantime, the Shadow Clan approached her with an offer that she accepted.

basicInfo.name: Black Rose
basicInfo.flavor: Black Rose entered this world through a mysterious rift. She was a spy in another world, and she's silently collecting intel on this one.
